description: Two ingredients and five minutes is all you need for this creamy blue cheese mayonnaise. Perfect for spreading on burgers and a must-have with buffalo wings.
keywords: Mayonnaise,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Bonus,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Blue cheese mayo Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a small bowl and serve.
